title: The Airship Artemis
description: Darkness descends on the Melbourne as greedy pirates hijack the ill-fated airship. Helpless passengers and crew are thrown into turmoil as they become unwilling pawns to their ransom demands. The Airship Ministry; desperate to resolve the crisis before any of the hostages are harmed, and before their stock prices drop further, decide on a bold plan. Sent to negotiate for the safe release of the hostages is Captain Thomas Lelaray of the Airship Artemis. Lelaray makes contact with the pirates and with his secret compliment of marine commandos, heâ€™s ordered to retrieve the hostages at all costs. What appears to be a simple mission, quickly becomes a struggle to survive as disaster looms on the horizon. Action and adventure follow Lelaray as he tries to accomplish his mission without the hostages being killed. From the streets of New York, and London, to the burning deserts of Libya; Lelaray struggles to tie the clues together that will ensure the success of the mission. Aided with the help of the beautiful marine lieutenant Jess Yamato, Lelaray finds himself torn between love, duty, and survival
author: Chester Quinn
